roleset.name: reassign to a role or classification
roleset.note: REDESIGNATE-V NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-earthquakes.

example.name: redesignate-v
example.text: If an aftershock is larger than the main shock , [the aftershock]-1 is redesignated *-1 as the main shock and the original main shock is redesignated as a foreshock .
example.arg: If an aftershock is larger than the main shock
